com.sshtools.ssh.components.jce
Class Ssh2RsaPublicKey

java.lang.Object
  com.sshtools.ssh.components.jce.Ssh2RsaPublicKey
All Implemented Interfaces:
SshPublicKey, SshRsaPublicKey
Direct Known Subclasses:
SshX509RsaPublicKey, SshX509RsaSha1PublicKey
public class Ssh2RsaPublicKey
extends Object
implements SshRsaPublicKey

A RSA public key implementation which uses a JCE provider.

Author:
Lee David Painter
